Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Mon Ami in Weymouth, you'll be near the beach and minutes from Weymouth Marina and Weymouth Beach. This hotel is within close proximity of Radipole Lake Nature Reserve and Sea Life Tower.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 42 guestrooms. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Conveniences include phones and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a fireplace in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Mon Ami. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a library and an elevator (lift). Free self parking is available onsite.
